text: hi welcome to the AWS cost optimization
Series today we're going to talk about
cost Explorer
AWS cost Explorer is a tool that enables
you to view and analyze your costs and
usage you can explore your usage and
cost using the main graph the cost
Explorer costs and usage reports or the
cost Explorer RI reports you can use
class Explorer to identify areas that
need furthering query and see trends
that you can use to understand your cost
when you first sign up for task Explorer
AWS prepares the data about your cost
for the current month and the last 12
months and then calculates the forecast
for the next 12 months the current
month's data is available for viewing in
about 24 hours so you will need to wait
a little bit the rest of your data takes
a few days longer
because Explorer refreshes your cost
data at least once every 24 hours
however this depends on your Upstream
data from your billing applications and
some data might be updated later than 24
hours let's have a look on the console
so to access the class Explorer
interface we can type on the search bar
AWS class Explorer click on the first
option
and we will get this
home page
so cost management
will provide us a cost summary with our
current amount cost and the forecast
month and cost
let's click on cost Explorer on the left
panel
here we will have the most used Services
Group by linked account region instance
type usage type resource we will see the
cost for the last six months
in this case from April to September for
example
but we can also create different graphs
we have bar graphs a stack or line
we have filters
in this case we are including all the
values for service Link account instance
type usage but we can click on them and
select the service we want to explore
for example amplify in this case I'm not
using amplify on this example but we can
take a look on ec2 for example
you can select all the options apply the
filters and we will get a new bar graph
here
scrolling down a little bit we can see a
table with the report of this service
in this case easy to
for the last months
and at the end we will get the service
total for all these services
some Advanced options might include a
blended costs amortized costs net and
Blended costs and net amortized cost
we can also include forecast values show
only uncategorized resources and show
only untucked resources
if we need to download this table for
example we can click here on download
CSV and we will get the same report here
to build our own
analysis
thanks for watching I hope you have
learned something new today and see you
in the next video
